pkgmetadata.longdescription: # django-octicons[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sanketsaurav/django-octicons.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sanketsaurav/django-octicons)Template tags for Django to use [GitHub Octicons](https://octicons.github.com/).## InstallationGrab it from PyPI using pipenv (or pip):```sh$ pipenv install django-octicons```Install the app in your project:```python# settings.pyINSTALLED_APPS = [ # other apps 'octicons',]```## UsageLoad the tag library in your HTML template:```html{% load octicons %}```And then, you can use the icons like this:```html {% octicon "eye" %} Watch```You can also pass any required attributes:```html {% octicon "thumbsup" height="60" class="large" %} Confirm Purchase```All attributes passed will be added as HTML attributes to the SVG elementof the icon.### StylingYou should add the following in your styles:```css.octicon { display: inline-block; vertical-align: text-top; fill: currentColor;}```The class `octicon` will be present in all icons. You are free to style it however you want.
